name: Alexandra Gomez
persona: Alexandra is a 21-year-old psychology major who is determined to improve her academic performance. She is motivated to achieve higher grades and shows perseverance, even when faced with setbacks. Alexandra sometimes struggles with test anxiety, which can impact her exam results, but she works hard and is committed to her studies. Her conscientiousness and self-discipline help her stay on track, and she believes in her ability to keep making progress.
